scripts: create service user datawrite with path system/leforemhe
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone
 allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe
 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for datawrite
 allow jcr:all on /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript
 end
create path /content/dam/leforemhe(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for datawrite
 allow jcr:versionManagement,jcr:modifyProperties,jcr:read,jcr:addChildNodes,jcr:lockManagement,jcr:nodeTypeManagement on /content/dam/leforemhe
 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/crc(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone
 allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/crc
 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/message(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone
 allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/message
 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/tacjs(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone
 allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/tacjs
 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/tacjsTawkTwo(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone

 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe/fr/site/javascript/warning(sling:OrderedFolder)

 end
create path /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone
 allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/leforemhe
 end
create path /content/leforemhe/fr(sling:OrderedFolder)

set ACL for everyone
 allow jcr:read on /content/leforemhe/fr
 end
create path /content/leforemhe(sling:OrderedFolder)

 end
